author: Brady Henderson
title: CB Griffin reuniting with Seahawks, source says
description: Cornerback Shaquill Griffin is signing one-year deal, $3 million contract with the Seahawks that can be worth up to $4 million, a source told ESPN's Jeremy Fowler.
content:
SEATTLE -- The Seahawks are bringing back veteran cornerback Shaquill Griffin for a second stint in Seattle, a source told ESPN's Jeremy Fowler on Wednesday.
The source said Griffin is receiving a o… [+1766 chars]

author: Luke Wood SOS News Editor
title: CB Electronics announce XP-Relay32 / 32X & 64
description: In response to user requests, CB Electronics will soon be released 32- and 64-channel versions of their relay-based digitally controlled patchbay.
content: CB Electronics have announced the upcoming launch of their latest series of digitally controlled patchbays. Since the release of the XP-Relay, the company say they have received requests for a larger… [+2104 chars]

author: Myles Simmons
title: CB Arthur Maulet signs 1-year deal with Texans
description: Veteran cornerback Arthur Maulet has found a new team.
content:
Veteran cornerback Arthur Maulet has found a new team. 
Per Cameron Wolfe of NFL Media, Maulet has signed a one-year deal with the Texans. 
Maulet, 32, spent the last two seasons with Baltimore. Wh… [+371 chars]
